posting_instruction: To post your ad on Aumeta Jobs channels, just click the right button and fill out a simple form.
country_not_selected_error: Country not selected for posting. Go to profile → select country.
ads_are_free: Posting is free. Beware of scammers.
file_uploading_instruction: Select the required file and upload it here
one_time_job_description: For one-time tasks, freelance or side jobs
no_such_form: This type of form is not yet ready

vacancy.address: London, Paris, New York, 15 Main.St etc.
vacancy.requirements: 2 years experience, proficient in Excel, English B2, etc. List the requirements for the employee.
vacancy.responsibilities: Client management, reporting, sales tasks, etc. List the duties the employee will perform.
vacancy.additional_info: Bonuses, career development and other benefits. Write any additional information if applicable.

internship.role_name: IT intern, Legal assistant, Photographer intern, etc.
internship.requirements: Basic design knowledge, responsibility, MS Office skills, 3rd-year student, English B1, and so on.
internship.responsibilities: Working with documents, answering calls, working with tables, preparing reports, sales, and so on.
internship.conditions: Future job opportunity, personal growth, participation in international projects, travel abroad, lunch, etc.
internship.address&format: Rome office, remote, hybrid, flexible schedule
internship.additional_info: Write if there is anything else: until March 16th, nature protection project, will last 3 months, certificate is provided, etc.

one_time_job.what_to_do: Moving service, repair, logo design, text translation or video shooting, etc. Describe the task briefly.
one_time_job.deadline: For today, by 6:00 PM or until May 27th
one_time_job.additional_info: Write if there’s anything else: tools required, experience and portfolio, car needed, etc.
